rlt.title: Rlt
rlt.description: '' or '+' or '++'. Remove linear trends in each voxel time series loaded from each input dataset, separately. option -rlt removes the least squares fit of 'a+b*t' to each voxel time series. option -rlt+ adds dataset mean back in. option -rlt++ adds overall mean of all dataset timeseries back in.
